thread.title: South Africa's Zuma 'innocent until proven otherwise'

title: South Africa's Zuma 'innocent until proven otherwise'
text:
South Africa's Zuma 'innocent until proven otherwise' 6:17am EDT - 01:53 
Former South African president Jacob Zuma appeared in court on Friday to face corruption charges relating to a $2.5 billion arms deal, later telling a crowd he would be proven innocent in the long running case that resurfaced after his fall from power.   
Former South African president Jacob Zuma appeared in court on Friday to face corruption charges relating to a $2.5 billion arms deal, later telling a crowd he would be proven innocent in the long running case that resurfaced after his fall from power.  //reut.rs/2JkdYZz
